Document:
# SAPORUM-CLASS DINING VESSEL
[color=#a4885c]Ship Size:[/color] Medium
[color=#a4885c]Recommended Crew:[/color] 1-3
[color=#a4885c]Power Gen Type:[/color] Uranium
[color=#a4885c]Expeditions:[/color] None
[color=#a4885c]IFF Console:[/color] None
"Shaped like two croissants, this dining shuttle is excellent for a tiny crew and gourmet experience."
# PREFLIGHT CHECKLIST
## 1. Power supply
## 1.1. Battery units
- Check that the S.U.P.E.R.P.A.C.M.A.N. generator unit is anchored to the floor. - Check that the SMES unit is anchored to the floor. - Check that the substation unit is anchored to the floor. - Check that the APC units Main Breaker is toggled on. - Check the APC unit's current Load* (W).
## 1.2. S.U.P.E.R.P.A.C.M.A.N. generator unit.
- Check that the generator unit is properly anchored. - Check that the generator unit is connected to the cable terminal of your SMES via HV. - Check the fuel remaining of the generator unit. - Set the generator unit output power to 36 kW. - Enable Injection.
## 2. Atmospherics
## 2.1. Distribution Loop
- Ensure that both canisters are wrenched to the connector ports. - Check that the gas mixer is of a suitable atmos mixture (~21% oxygen, ~79% nitrogen). - Enable the gas pump into the distribution system.
## 2.2. Waste Loop
- Enable waste loop pump.
## 3. Other checks
- Check that the gyroscopes are anchored, powered, and enabled. - Check that the mini gravity generator is anchored, powered, and enabled.
## Sidenotes
* - Saporum-class dining vessels are equipped with three APCs unit that can be used to appraise the ship's total power consumption. Unmodified Saporum-class ship requires ~31.50 kW of power to remain operational.
